sit in.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to be present at a meeting but not take an active part in it
sit in.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Would you like to sit in on some of my interviews?
sit in.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a type of protest in which people refuse to leave the place where they work or study until their demands are considered or agreed to
sit in.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Several thousand students staged sit-ins and protest marches.
